svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 13, 2022" date: "2022-08-13"
• Mainnet Merge targets September 15, tentative TTD: 58750000000000000000000 TTD to be reconfirmed on next weeks core devs call, 5GB DAG
size not expected to cause big drop in hash rate Bellatrix upgrade at epoch: 144896 September 6 11:34:47am UTC Bordel predicts mainnet
Merge September 15 Client releases expected by August 22
• TTD to be reconfirmed on next weeks core devs call, 5GB DAG size not expected to cause big drop in hash rate
• Bellatrix upgrade at epoch: 144896 September 6 11:34:47am UTC
• Goerli testnet merged successfully , finalizing after some config & client issues
• Somer’s Goerli testnet staking guides: Teku , Lighthouse , Nimbus & Prysm
• Sepolia testnet post-merge upgrade , update your nodes before August 17
• Erigon v2022.08.01-alpha : better management of block snapshot files, fix for small memory leak in header downloading
• KZG ceremony: design and reference implementation in Python
• Future of light clients : browser-based light client and Portal Network ultralight client
• Danny Ryan’s Finalized PoS update : be ready for anything for the next ~5 weeks
• PoS implementers call video . Notes from Ben Edgington and Christine Kim : Mainnet Merge TTD & Bellatrix epoch calculations, 10 days
between upgrades Planning weekly mainnet shadow forks MEV-boost: local building should happen in parallel, circuit breaker uses rolling
window to check for skipped slots
• Mainnet Merge TTD & Bellatrix epoch calculations, 10 days between upgrades
• MEV-boost: local building should happen in parallel, circuit breaker uses rolling window to check for skipped slots
• Arbitrum Nova (using AnyTrust) is open for the public; initial data availability committee includes Consensys, FTX, Google Cloud,
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Nexus Mutual !
The yield is still out there. When you discover the next opportunity make sure you don’t get rekt.
Maximize yield. Minimize Risk. Enjoy peace of mind knowing Nexus Mutual has you covered. Become a member and protect your assets against
• Solidity v0.8.16 : fix for head overflow bug in calldata tuple ABI-reencoding; more gas-efficient checked addition & subtraction
• Vitalik’s idea to use stealth addresses to privately hold ERC721 NFTs
• Guide to mining create2 salts for efficient contract addresses
• m1guelpf’s dapp-starter : updated with light/dark theme, ConnectKit & wagmi v0.6
• Blocknative Transaction Distribution Network : submit a transaction to multiple nodes
• MEV bundle generator (Rust) open sourced: graph based, custom Yul multicall
• Ethernaut DAO CTF hackable contract solution
• Yield missing function override post mortem, $206k was at risk on Arbitrum
• dYdX free gas vulnerability disclosed, $25k bounty paid
• OpenZeppelin Contracts ECDSA signature malleability security advisory
• Curve finance DNS hijack via DNS cache poisoning, $612k stolen
• USDC , USDT & Chainlink announce Merge support
• Reddit Community Points migrated to Arbitrum Nova
• SushiSwap AMM live on Arbitrum Nova
• Stratos NFT marketplace supports Arbitrum Nova
• OpenSea stolen items policy requires police report to confirm theft
• Gitcoin Passport : decentralized identifier aggregating web2/web3 authenticator stamps
• Gnosis Chain looking for Head of Bridges , Head of Validators & DevRel Eng .
• Ethereum Foundation seek a generalist ecosystem developer
• ØVIX + GOGO Protocol: VP of Engineering
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to abcoathup.eth on mainnet or Layer 2. Pay with one
• US Treasury’s OFAC sanctioned Tornado Cash & associated addresses: Resources blocked : GitHub organization & personal accounts of
contributors, USDC on Tornado Cash contracts, Infura & Alchemy RPC and eth limo domain Coin Center response Developer arrested in the
Netherlands Chainalysis Tornado Cash sources : 10.5% stolen funds, 17.7% sanctioned addresses 0.1 ETH sent to 400+ ENS addresses from
• Resources blocked : GitHub organization & personal accounts of contributors, USDC on Tornado Cash contracts, Infura & Alchemy RPC and
• Chainalysis Tornado Cash sources : 10.5% stolen funds, 17.7% sanctioned addresses
• 0.1 ETH sent to 400+ ENS addresses from Tornado Cash
• US SEC settles with Bloom [PDF] for selling unregistered securities in ICO
• Proposal for multi-dimensional resource pricing [PDF] in blockchains
• Nathan Schneider: cryptoeconomics as a limitation on governance
• SNARK frontend & backend overheads and future scalability
• ÆPIC leak : Intel CPU architectural bug leaking uninitialized data, requires privileged access
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @evan_van_ness and @abcoathup to get most of the week’s news in
• Sep 23 - ETH HCMC summit (Ho Chi Minh)
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
